author: Special Correspondent
text: A National Lok Adalat conducted at the Madras High Court Bench here on Saturday ended up settling cases worth Rs.36.24 crore of which Rs.35 crore was with respect to people whose lands, spread over 286 acres at Melpandiapuram in Ottapidaram Taluk, were acquired for future needs of Tuticorin Thermal Power Station in Thoothukudi.
title: Lok Adalat organised
